history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: interval_disjoint. qsimpl time: 1 use: interval_disjoint,not.

exceptions.tactic: intros v k i1 g1 i2 g2 H1 H2.
intros v' k i1 g1 i2 g2 H1 H2.
intros v' k' i1 g1 i2 g2 H1 H2.
intros v' k' i1' g1 i2 g2 H1 H2.
intros v' k' i1' g1' i2 g2 H1 H2.
intros v' k' i1' g1' i2' g2 H1 H2.
intros v' k' i1' g1' i2' g2' H1 H2.

original: intros v k i1 g1 i2 g2 H1 H2. unfold interval_disjoint in H2. unfold not in H1. pose (i := interval_union i1 i2). pose (g := fun x : nat => if in_interval i1 x then g1 x else g2 x). exists g. split. - unfold g. unfold i. rewrite interval_union_left. + apply H1. + intro. apply H2 with x. apply H. apply H3. - split. + intros x H3. unfold g. destruct (in_interval i1 x) eqn:eq. * rewrite <- eq. apply H1. * destruct (in_interval i2 x) eqn:eq2. { exfalso. apply H. apply eq2. } { contradiction. } + intros x H3. unfold g. destruct (in_interval i2 x) eqn:eq. * rewrite <- eq. apply H2. * destruct (in_interval i1 x) eqn:eq2. { exfalso. apply H. apply eq2. } { contradiction. }
